extension.summary: Player Monitor - Observe Player Status of Kodi
extension.description: Player Monitor - Monitoring video player events with the xbmc.Monitor class. Events are logged into files within the addon_data/service.player.monitor folder. This monitoring addon is usefull especially for POI systems which are in operation without constant supervision. If a video stream was interrupted the service is trying to restart this stream in an intervall of 30 seconds up to 3 times.
